name: murine secondary lymphoid tissues 0

name: murine secondary lymphoid tissues 1
description: * Prepare single-cell suspensions of murine secondary lymphoid tissues, e.g. lymph nodes or spleen, in PBS.

name: murine secondary lymphoid tissues 2
description: Filter cell suspension through fine mesh.

name: murine secondary lymphoid tissues 4

name: murine secondary lymphoid tissues 4 1
description: Adjust cell numbers with PBS and add ≤3x10<sup>6</sup> cells in 100µl per well of a 96-well round-bottom plate.

name: primary antibody 2x mixes 0
description: * Prepare primary antibody 2x mixes in flow buffer in 1.5ml Eppendorf tubes.

name: primary antibody 2x mixes 1
description: Calculate with 20µl volume to be added per well of the plate \(40µl final staining volume).

name: primary antibody 2x mixes 2
description: If several samples are to be stained, calculate the total volume needed by multiplying the number of samples by the volume of the 2x mix to be added to each well of sample \(20µl), e.g. for 10 samples:

name: primary antibody 2x mixes 3
description: + 40µl extra void volume = 240µl.

name: primary antibody 2x mixes 4
description: Include anti-CXCR5-biotin \(1:25 for 2x mix; final dilution will be 1:50), anti-CD4, and anti-PD-1.

name: compensation control stains 0
description: Also prepare compensation control stains if necessary.

name: tubes 0
description: Keep tubes on ice until needed.

name: determined 0

name: supernatant 1
description: Right before use, spin tubes in a microcentrifuge for 3min at full speed to remove excess protein aggregates; only use supernatant._

name: supernatant 2
description: * Spin down plate at 700g for 2min, discard supernatant by quickly flicking the plate, and loosen cell pellet by briefly vortexing the plate on full speed setting \(add a paper towel on top of the plate to avoid any potential spill-over)

name: washed cells 0
description: * Wash cells with 200µl flow buffer \(for analysis only use flow buffer with 0.05% sodium azide, for sorting viable cells use flow buffer without sodium azide).

name: blocking solution 0
description: Add 20µl of blocking solution: 5µg/ml anti-CD16/32 \(“Fc-block”) and 2% normal mouse serum/2% normal rat serum in flow buffer.

name: primary antibody 2x mixes 5
description: Incubate for 5min on ice.

name: blocking solution 1
description: Add 20µl of 2x primary antibody mixes \(from step **7**) on top of the blocking solution \(don’t wash in between).

name: primary antibody 2x mixes 6
description: Incubate for 30-40min on ice.

name: flow buffer 0
description: Add 160µl of flow buffer and repeat step **8** and **9** and again **8**.

name: streptavidin-APC 0
description: Add 40µl of streptavidin-APC \(0.5µg/ml final concentration in flow buffer) per well and incubate for 15-20min on ice.

name: washed cells 1
description: Resuspend cells in flow buffer for subsequent analysis on a flow cytometer or for cell sorting.

name: viability dye 0
description: Include a viability dye \(e.g.

name: viability dye 1
description: 7-AAD) that allows for the exclusion of dead cells, e.g. resuspend cells in 100µl flow buffer and add 1µl of 7-AAD.

name: washed cells 2
description: * Following steps **1** through **6**, add 100µl of 1:1000-diluted eFluor780 Fixable Viability Dye \(eBioscience) in PBS \(no serum/protein, no sodium azide) to the 100µl of cells.

name: primary antibody 2x mixes 5 1
description: Incubate for 10min on ice.
